TopicTitle: I've got the science and samples, now what?

Articles.Content:
I just put a lab into Minmus' orbit, landed a lander on the Greater Flats, gathered a sample, performed all the sciences and re-docked with my lab.

So now what?

Do I EVA, remove all the science data from the units and then reset them?

The other question I have is regarding the surface samples.

Can I take a sample from every biome with me and store them all at once in my lander? (I'm flying the lander back to Kerbin with all the science).

Any help appreciated.
You can just transmit science data straight from any docked craft, btw.

Thank you. I was able to land at each biome, dock and save all the science. I did the "rinse, repeat" thing for a few hours and gained 6000 science points on Minmus alone! It does feel like a grind though getting the points to advance in research.
